text:

Venice (Los Angeles), CA Fulltime, Onsite Software Engineer - Language agnostic, smart, dynamic, with web-based application experience preferred: http://hire.jobvite.com/j/?cj=omqlXfwO&s=HackerNews

We have great benefits: Hot location - Abbot Kinney Blvd. filled with shops and eateries Health Benefits (Medical, Dental, Vision, Life & Disability) Competitive Silicon Valley wages Flexible work schedules No vacation, sick, dress, or other policy that restricts you Surfboards, paddle boards, bikes, team sports & weekly jam sessions Personalized work stations Stock in a company experiencing rapid growth

Email our recruiter! Rebecca@zefr.com or APPLY TODAY!
